(Oh, sorry. I thought you were at the CF. Just replace every CF wit 
the word Ark in that post.)

Starscream

Starscream dropped his jaw at what KitKat said. Phobia dead? No way. 
If Megatron did it, he would pay. Starscream remembered that he did 
not fully trust Phobia, but he respected him for his pychological 
knowledge and thought of him as the only one of the group besides 
KitKat that was his peer. No time to mourn though. He had to go and 
help Drillbit fight Inferno.

Starscream flew out of the base towards Drillbit.
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon smiled.

"Our chip has over-powered the Maximal programming. When she comes 
out of stasis, she will be ours again."

"But how do we get her out?" Blaze asked.

"That's where you come in. We will all turn our cloaks off, and 
distract the Maximals by drawing them outside for a battle. 
Meanwhile, you will still have your cloak on, and will enter the base 
through a large panel that is missing on the other side of the ship 
because of previous battles. When you find Spears, slap this cloak on 
her and run back to base. We'll keep the battle up until you are at 
the base. Put Spears in a holding cell until I get there, and if she 
wakes tell her the Maximals did something evil to her and we must fix 
it. Everyone understand? Good. We begin in 10 cycles. Everyone load 
up!
